name: Verenigde Hollandse Zeil Compagnie
memberOrga: a Dutch foundation has no members as natural persons
goal: The Verenigde Hollandse Zeil Compagnie ( Dutch United Sailing Compagnie) aims to globally encourage and support the more than 400 Dutch sailing professional and commercial vessels with promotion and marketing.
interests: Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Internal Market, Transport
euInitiatives: Dutch sailing vessels operating in European territorial water and in the Baltic area, a small amount operating World Wide
